item.title: Road Trip Travel Log 02.01
item.description: On the road from Albuquerque to Flagstaff, near which we turn south to Red Rock State Park in Arizona. The kids are keen to get in a hike today, the first â€œrealâ€ day of our vacation, as far as Iâ€™m concerned. Itâ€™s been fun watching the younger two get excited over taking pictures from the car with the little Instax Mini. That was Kassiâ€™s great idea. We bought Anthony around 150 exposures and his eyes got wide when I told him I wanted him to use every single one by the end of the trip.

item.title: Road Trip Travel Log 01.02
item.description: Picture of me in the Llano Estacado, Texasâ€™s â€œwine countryâ€. On the road for quite a while and still not out of the state. Holding up well. Fear the little one may be coming down with a cold. Hope heâ€™s better after some rest. Changed restaurant plans and will revisit our old favorite in Albuquerque for the third year in a row. The food there has always been great, though the service is consistently slow.
